issue.title: [CF 1508] Timer Text Not Visible
issue.body:
The Timer Text will not show since the update. I've tried uninstalling and still nothing. 


> Posted by CurseForge user comiccrow | Imported from CurseForge issue #1508 | Raw

comments.body:
It works fine. If you have other addons that modify the timer text, try uninstalling them. This might include OmniCC or ElvUI or any number of other addons.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
